What is meant by the meaning of silent tranquility?

The meaning of silent tranquility refers to eliminating afflictions and the tranquility of various defilements.
By eliminating afflictions, one is then said to have removed the various thoughts and hopes of greed and desire.

By removing thoughts of desire, one has nothing to think about. By having nothing to think about, one does not cling to the realms.
